## LinkedList.forEach() method

Calls `callback` once for each value present in the linked list. If a `thisArg` parameter is provided, it will be used as the `this` value for each invocation of `callback`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forEach(callback: (element: T, set: LinkedList<T>) => void, thisArg?: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | (element: T, set: [LinkedList](./calcium.linkedlist.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;) =&gt; void | Function to execute for each element. |
|  thisArg | any | Value to use as <code>this</code> when executing <code>callback</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
